702068f-a.title: Bronx: West Farms Road - East 167th Street.
702068f-a.text:
West Farms Road, at the south-east corner of
East 167th Street, showing the Yoxhurst Mansion,
also known as the Iiffany House. Ht was built
by Nr. William W. Fo in 1848 on his extensive
estate. Apartment buildings were later erected
on the site.
View 1: Gift of .andall Comfort
1838
View 2: E. P. Chrystie
June 1, .2
702068f-a.folder: West Farms Road & East 167th Street., Bronx, NY
